column1: Educational achievement and other factors, in PISA 2015 (downloaded on Oct 18 2019, as several separate reports from https://pisadataexplorer.oecd.org/ide/idepisa/ and then combined, extended with region, and then cleaned to remove rows with missing values by Alan Fekete)

column3: Averages for PISA mathematics scale: overall mathematics, age 15 years
column4: Averages for PISA reading scale: overall reading, age 15 years
column5: Averages for PISA science scale: overall science, age 15 years
column6: Averages for index mother occupational status, age 15 years
column7: Averages for index father occupational status, age 15 years
column8: Averages for student-teacher ratio, age 15 years
column9: Averages for index proportion of all teachers isced level 5a master, age 15 years
